DOC.brief_summary: This randomize pilot trial study clamp unclamped surgery treat patient kidney cancer . Unclamped surgery kidney cancer may fewer side effect
DOC.brief_title: Clamped Unclamped Surgery Treating Patients With Kidney Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . To compare change renal function ( post-operative compare pre-operative ) patient undergo unclamped partial nephrectomy without control hypotension ( Arm A ) vs. undergo partial nephrectomy hilar clamping ( Arm B ) , measure change estimate glomerular filtration rate ( eGFR ) . SECONDARY OBJECTIVES : I . To compare change renal function ( post-operative compare pre-operative ) patient undergo unclamped partial nephrectomy without control hypotension ( Arm A ) vs. undergo partial nephrectomy hilar clamping ( Arm B ) , measure change MAG3 ( % function attribute affected kidney ) change serum creatinine . II . To evaluate safety unclamped procedure estimate difference complication rate patient undergo unclamped partial nephrectomy without control hypotension ( Arm A ) vs. patient undergo partial nephrectomy hilar clamping ( Arm B ) term intra-operative complication post-operative complication . III . To evaluate surgical effectiveness unclamped procedure estimate difference patient undergo unclamped partial nephrectomy without control hypotension ( Arm A ) vs. patient undergo partial nephrectomy hilar clamping ( Arm B ) term surgical margin status , estimate blood loss , transfusion rate ( intraoperative post-operative ) . TERTIARY OBJECTIVES : I . To record compare intrarenal blood flow resistive index measurement order determine relationship exist intraoperative finding postoperative renal function . II . To quantify amount acute kidney injury ( AKI ) compare difference patient undergo unclamped partial nephrectomy without control hypotension ( Arm A ) vs. patient undergo partial nephrectomy hilar clamping ( Arm B ) measure urinary serum biomarkers . III . To compare effect unclamped procedure ( Arm A ) clamp procedure ( Arm B ) patient baseline eGFR < 60 , patient age > = 75 ( exploratory subset analysis ) . OUTLINE : Patients randomize 1 2 treatment arm . ARM A : Patients undergo unclamped partial nephrectomy . Some patient may undergo unclamped partial nephrectomy control hypotension . ARM B : Patients undergo clamp partial nephrectomy . After completion study treatment , patient follow 1 week 1 , 3 , 6 , 12 month .
DOC.criteria: Solitary renal mass solitary complex renal cyst Bosniak > /= Grade 3 Clinical stage T1a , T1b Body Mass Index ( BMI ) < 40 Surgical candidate ( preoperative cardiac anesthesia clearance obtain ) Able give inform consent 24 hour urine collection complete report obtain MAG3/DTPA scan complete report obtain Pregnancy More 1 renal mass complex renal cyst Bosniak > /= Grade 3 ipsilateral kidney Previous renal surgery ipsilateral kidney Clinical Stage T2 great BMI > 40 Contraindication systemic hypotension : Left Main Coronary Arterial Disease Severe cardiac decompensation ( ejection fraction [ EF ] < 40 % ) Prior history cerebrovascular accident Unable consent Unwilling unable potentially receive blood transfusion
